title: Integrate context generation into engine run loop
description:
Add ensureEpicContext() to engine that generates context before first task.

## Requirements
- Check if context exists before starting epic
- Generate if missing and epic has >1 children
- Skip generation for single-task epics (no amortization benefit)
- Load context and inject into IterationContext
- Handle generation failures gracefully (proceed without context)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] `ensureEpicContext(ctx, epicID) error` method on Engine
- [ ] `loadEpicContext(epicID) (string, error)` method on Engine
- [ ] Context generated before first iteration
- [ ] Skipped if epic has â‰¤1 children
- [ ] Skipped if context already exists
- [ ] Generation failure logs warning but doesn't abort run
- [ ] EpicContext populated in every IterationContext

## Integration Points
- Call ensureEpicContext at start of Engine.Run()
- Inject context.Store and context.Generator into Engine
- Add context fields to EngineConfig
